items.summary: On the Home page hero banner, replace or modify the background image so it no longer contains visible embedded text. Either generate a clean background image without any text, or apply a strong dark overlay (e.g., semi-transparent dark navy layer at 60â€“75% opacity) over the existing hero background so that any embedded text in the image is fully obscured and does not interfere with the hero banner's headline, subheadline, or CTA button text.
